manifest.author: nightx24
manifest.changelog:
* Enabled the option to import photos from Google Photos.

* Redesigned the Reels direct share reply bar and Send icon.

* Added a setting for Likes visibility (you can control who can see your likes).

* Changed Notes audience from "Followers you follow back" to "Friends."

* Enabled the Archive option in profiles (long-press your shared media to archive).

* Redesigned the Notes format button.

* Enabled Auto Reshare to Story (when you post a Reel, it automatically shares to your Story too).

* Added the option to change Content Preferred Languages (functionality may not be fully stable yet).

* Brought back the old airplane icon for Direct messages.

* Enabled the new airplane icon appearance across the app.

* Fixed AI-related image creation issues in Direct.

* Enabled rounded corners for Stories feed reshares.

* Simplified the Reels overflow Interested options
manifest.name: Night-X's Backup
